content: except for one that you can use to attach the flower to hathi flower b rose chain 15 start in 3rd chain from the hook 2 half_double_crochet in the next 4 st 2 double_crochet in the next 7 st 2 treble_crochet in the last 2 st chain 3 slip_stitch into the last st cut yarn and pull through to close roll this into a rose shape use the yarn end to secure the base of the flower in shape to make some small leaves slip_stitch yarn to any point at the base of the rose repeat r 2 of flower a flower c r 1 in a magic_ring chain 2 double_crochet chain 2 slip_stitch in the ring 6 times cut yarn pull through you can make a variety of flowers with more or less petals with or without little leaves with treble_crochet in stead of double_crochet and soon many more free flower patterns can be found on pinterest i hope you had fun making your own little hathi i would love to see your work you can tag me on instagram @bokkyshome please use #little_hathi little hathi is a pattern designed and written by yvonne van zijl do not copy or distribute this pattern or any part of it this pattrn is for personal use you may sell items made with the pattern but please credit me as the designer
